name: UIView.TintAdjustmentMode
desc: The tint adjustment mode for the view.

items.name: case automatic
items.desc: The tint adjustment mode of the view is the same as its superviewâ€™s tint adjustment mode (or UIViewTintAdjustmentModeNormal if the view has no superview).

items.name: case normal
items.desc: The view's tintColor property returns the completely unmodified tint color of the view.

items.name: case dimmed
items.desc: The view's tintColor property returns a desaturated, dimmed version of the view's original tint color.
